page.title: 13KENNELS
page.content: Mrs Prideaux has lived in Bridport for fourteen years.She started the kennels she now owns in 1979.Police from five different police stations bring their stray dogs to Mrs Prideaux. They are Portland,Weymouth,Lyme,Beaminster and Bridport.Before bringing the stray dogs to Mrs Prideaux the police write down a complete description of the dog so that if anybody came in claiming a dog they would know all the information about the dog.The first thing that Mrs Prideaux does when she gets a stray dog is give it a full medical check up and keep it away from other dogs.She feeds her dogs on a complete dogfood 'Omega'.When she gets a stray dog she treats it with extra loving care and it will trust her.The police only pay for it to be kept at Mrs Prideaux for one week then Mrs Prideaux finds homes for them.
